Title: All reactionaries are paper tigers. In appearance, the reactionaries are terrifying, but in reality they are not so powerful. From a long-term point of view, it is not the reactionaries but the people who are really powerful. Mao Zedong
Publisher: Shanghai geming jiaoyu chubanshe (上海革命教育出版社)
Notes: Selected from the exhibition 'Long Live the Victory of Chairman Mao's Revolutionary Line' (选自毛主席革命路线胜利万岁展览会).
Theme: Foreign Friends: National Liberation MovementsQuotations from Chairman Mao
